column3: Seems like an easy mistake to make. Could you add a check to make it fail reliably?

> Seems like an easy mistake to make. Could you add a check to make it fail reliably?\n\nExcellent idea. I've repurposed this PR to add checking that only one NetworkThread is created. The extra checks have caught three additional potential bugs/races.
Why not keep this instance and check for it, instead of enumerating threads with a custom name?
I can't see how that's any better. Perhaps you can push a branch to demonstrate what you mean.
